column3: Content of address specified in register
The contents of the location whose ES segment relative address is in register DI.
The contents of the address contained in register SI relative to the SI register’s default segment (DS) or the overridden segment
Indicates the offset is read from the SI register if the address-size attribute is 16, from the ESI register if the address-size attribute is 32.
For a 64-bit register indicates that the offset is read from the 64-bit RSI register if the address-size attribute is 64
Indicates the operand's memory location is a segment-relative offset.
Indicates that the content of the source operand is a segment-relative offset
Assignment: The value of B is assigned to A.
BitShift: The destination operand is shifted left by COUNT bits
BitShift: The destination operand is shifted rigth by COUNT bits
